body:
And normaly i love Kasukabe Taro doujin on To love ru but when he/she do something like this i am disappointed 
But that is me

Honestly i do not like this type of doujin especialy with super character like her. Honnestly while i am not fond of ntr i really hate it when is about famous character from really popular manga like To love ru or Infinite Stratos or High School DxD... i really harbor those kind of ntr when a likeable mc get ntr

JOHNfreedom1234 You have any idea of many shit doujin of she being raped, humilliated. I cannot understand the sick hate from those bastards artist towards her. And now with that fatfuck of principal and saruyama loser overcrossed the limits.

Yui is a good character tsundere and her fall in love with Rito was more developed and credible beyond his kindness than the other girls. Goddamn it even she imaginated raising a family with him and Celine as her daughter, Yui will never accept the harem plan.

Is a blatant lie if you really think that way of her, that means you are so fucked up in your mind.

I should beat your fucking face until you're almost dead

Lautaro Rodríguez Se La Come. What do you mean she doesn't deserve this? She doesn't look sad and the story makes no mention that she was forced into it. 

If AU!Yui wants to be a slut then why not? It's not like as if it's canon. 

Perhaps you are overthinking it, maybe your self-inserting yourself into the mindset of a cuck because you are insecure and you're never ever going to have Yui all to yourself.

*Pats shoulder* Mate, I think you should let go and touch some grass. It's just a drawing after all, calm down

JOHNfreedom1234
FUCK YOURSELF
Yui don't deserve all this crap

Okay... To the people complaning about NTR? Where, exactly, is Rito within this doujin? And is there any mention of Rito having a relationship with Yui or Yui having feelings for Rito?

And no, you cannot use canon to support your arguments. Please stick to the material at hand.
Phenomenal. We need more pasties in our lives.
Yui is great but seriously if it's just her getting the most of attention of NTR/rape/vanilla and nobody else as much then I'm disappointed. I guess this means she's best girl
Happy slutty Yui truly is great. No need for NTR or convoluted excuses, she just wants cocks.

@hajiman This doujin must have been venus momo club (momo simps) giving her a well deserved bukkake, that would have been more interesting
Or the sequel to trouble teachers with a threesome
the author fell in drak side
I agree with you @Lautaro Rodríguez Se La Come. Yuuki Rito shouldn't be cucked, my man is a good guy. It's a shame that this artist made NTR.

Which is the fucking problem with doujins artists towards Yui? Most of the half are ntr, rape specially with that stupid fat fuck of principal and now with that of self insert shit of saruyama

Fuck you to the hell once for all in an horrible death to kittsu, abe ryuu, nagisa minami, amaniji, futomaki tamamo, asahimaru, takeda, hiromitsu, hyogetsu, minase, carn, nozarashi satoru, satou yoshio, ganari ryu, dairiseki, zusuhane suzu, orenchin, tatsuhiko, kurouku, myouga, crimson, yuki tomoshi, kuromotokun, rooking shiromatsu, terasu mc, llm lovelovemaid and rnarusawa sora.
This has to be netorare right?
